Reviews.Title: “Balmoral... good choice!”

Reviews.Content: charming hotel elegant french style hotel kept clean welcomed friendly receptionist balmoral hotel beautifully decorated bathroom bath separate toilet couple nights silent beds comfortable chose balmoral central location nearby arc de triomphe chic paris hotel 2 min walk metrorer station charles de gaulle etoile means easy access paris looking forward staying balmoral

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful romantic hotel, faultless service.”
